remarks: Transfer a cancellation law like ~ mulcan to the function operation. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 16-Nov-2015.)
statement:
caofcan.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofcan.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> T ) $.
caofcan.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> S ) $.
caofcan.4 $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
caofcan.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. T /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x R y ) = ( x R z ) <-> y = z ) ) $.
caofcan $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F oF R G ) = ( F oF R H ) <-> G = H ) ) $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
